numbered_ace_sentences: 1. At least 60% of the players in all the shown leagues are colored people.
2. At least 13% of the head coaches in all the shown leagues are colored people.
3. I wonder why the shown leagues are mostly dominated by colored players.
5. Sports are becoming available to more people.
6. It is reasonable to assume that there will be more diversity among players.
7. It is reasonable to assume that there will be more diversity among coaches.
8. The headline is: The percent of colored people coaching and playing in national leagues.
